extendedInfo.description: An easy to pick up and play mini golf game in 3D in a cartoon setting!Complete all 18 holes, and see if you score the best in this fun cartoon miniature golf game. In full 3D and with beautiful cartoonish relaxing sceneries, enjoy putting the green in this obstacle laden mini golf course.Bring out the golfer in you in this exciting mini golf game.Breathtaking 3D sceneries, cute nice environments, perfect to relax on the green after a day of hard work or play. Enjoy the variety of landscape as you traverse from one cartoonish location to another.Navigate the obstacles, find the shortest and easiest path to the hole. Don't miss a shot! Don't hit the golf ball too hard, or you will end up with your ball knocked into the water.Just make sure your ball finds the hole with the flag in this awesome beautiful minigolf game. Putt your way to greatness!So, whether you call it miniature golf, mini-golf, midget golf or goofy golf, you're sure to enjoy this superbly great mini golf 3D game, set in a beautifully varying cartoon setting.

reviews.title: Unimpressed
reviews.comment: Boring holes, cheap graphics, and I don\'t think instructions would have hurt anybody.  The popups were the least annoying part...
reviews.author: Seth Traver

reviews.title: Epic
reviews.comment: This game i s the best golf game I have ever played and shame on you people who don\'t like this game show some respect god

reviews.title: Blech!
reviews.comment: Uninstalled. Too many pop-ups in game. Can only handle so much of that. Ciao!

reviews.comment: This game is the best :-D

reviews.comment: Minigolf matchup is a far better game....this one is getting uninstalled. Nothing overly wrong with this one....just didn\'t like it.

reviews.title: Minus 3 stars
reviews.comment: Poor controls lack finesse. Too many repetative ads. Just don\'t bother.
reviews.author: Andy Harrison

reviews.title: Wtf
reviews.comment: Not that good of a game. But what lets it down the most is that you cant use full power on the shots. Why have it if you can\'t use it. I dont like to write bad reviews.  But on this accusation I fill just.
reviews.author: Mark Scott

reviews.title: Ruined by advertising
reviews.comment: Simple game but definitely not one of the better golf games and completely spoilt by intrusive advertising through out. Uninstalled
reviews.author: Gemma Fraser

reviews.title: Good time waster.
reviews.comment: Quite good looking for an android game, not designed to be any way realistic physics wise, however when you can clear all the holes in a couple of mins while waiting for the train, it does its job nicely, be prepared for adds as they have been cleverly placed so you will tap at least one while playing.
reviews.author: Michael Lawrence

reviews.title: Horribly ruined by adverts
reviews.comment: Game was enjoyable but as you go thru the levels the advertising gets bigger an you can\'t ignore it as it fills the screen and the skip ad button dies nothing but load the adverts web page. Uninstalled. Waste of time.
reviews.author: Anthony Jackson

reviews.title: CRAP
reviews.comment: Thinking of one word to sum this app up ermmmmm oh yeah RUBBISH, + uninstalled.
reviews.author: nakka H

reviews.title: Not great
reviews.comment: Not great tbh. Fun to play once then it\'s so boring. Doesn\'t even have high scores and if you accidentally click an ad half way through your game, you have to start all over again. Not worth the 18mb download
reviews.author: Lynn Pennie
